comment: the technical sequence of all locations
GRTS address (`final`, i.e. after prior replacements)
type (referring to "N2kHabTypes"."type") as originally assigned in the sample
indication that the cell is not suitable for the destined scheme, and has to be replaced
optional indicator to revisit disapproval, if it is expexted to be temporary
whether or not the location is permanently unavailable
in case of disapproval, suggestion which types could be present instead (referring to "N2kHabTypes"."type")
whether disapproval has implications for habitat map
feedback for follow-up via habitat mapping
free text notes which will be transferred to the field app
